title: Remarks as Prepared for Delivery by First Lady Jill Biden at a Holiday Performance for Military Families by the Broadway Cast of Disney’s Frozen | The White House
content: East Room, The White HouseWelcome to the White House! Thank you all for joining us today. It was wonderful talking to some of you earlier, and hearing about your experiences as military kids. Today is a very special day at the White House – we’re unveiling our holiday decorations! And we wanted to share this moment with you – our military children. You answer the call of duty for your country, and the President and I are so grateful. So, we wanted to say thank you, and share some of the magic, wonder, and joy of this season with you. Now, how many of you have seen the Disney movie, “Frozen?” Do you know Elsa? Do you know Anna? Do you know Olaf? Well, we have a very special performance to get all of you ready for the magic of the holidays! Please help me welcome to the White House, the cast of Disney’s stage musical, “Frozen!”###
